text: Girona Futbol Club, commonly known as just Girona, is a professional football club based in Girona, Catalonia, Spain. It was founded in 1930, and currently plays in La Liga. Girona holds its home matches at Estadi Montilivi. == Current squad == == References == Category:1930s establishments in Spain Category:1930 establishments in Europe Category:Spanish football clubs Category:Girona
title: Girona FC
